name: File Renamer Bot
description: A powerful Telegram bot to rename files, add custom thumbnails, and more!

API_ID.description: Your Telegram API ID from my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: Your Telegram API Hash from my.telegram.org

MONGO_DB_URI.description: MongoDB Connection URI (e.g., from MongoDB Atlas)

FORCE_SUB_CHANNELS.description: Comma-separated list of channel IDs/usernames for force subscribe (e.g., -1001234567890,my_channel_username)

ADMINS.description: Comma-separated list of Telegram User IDs for bot administrators (e.g., 123456789,987654321)

START_UP_PIC.description: Direct URL to an image for the bot's /start message

UPDATE_CHANNEL_URL.description: Optional: Link to your bot's update channel

SUPPORT_GROUP_URL.description: Optional: Link to your bot's support group
